game.name: Tales of Medieval Duelists
game.shortDescription: Ditch the animations. In Tales of Medieval Duelists, every swordfight is a unique physics-based clash. Master precise, skill-driven combat where timing a perfect parry is your key to victory. Build your legend with deep progression, gear, and a high-risk win streak multiplier.
